EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Grand & Toy - Account 526583 (1563812629.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
​Hello Jodie, Thank you for choosing Grand & Toy and we look forward to working with you in the future. Your login credentials have been emailed to you as well.
Did you want me to set up Tricia Flores Tricia.Flores@activenetwork.com <[[mailto:Tricia.Flores@activenetwork.com]]> with a user profile as well?
Grand & Toy has all of your needs in office supplies and workplace essentials to help maximize a perfect balance in quality of service and prices. Grand & Toy is proud to support your organization with exclusive prices and services to increase efficiency in the office by reducing your business cost. In addition, please do not hesitate to contact Grand & Toy with any questions or feel free to contact the dedicated Grand & Toy Customer Care Center at 1 866 391 8111.
Thank you for the opportunity to earn your trust and business,
Kind Regards, Kyle Kyle McGuire Business Development Manager, Canada 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: kylemcguire@grandandtoy.com |Tel: 613-244-4023 Toll Free: 800-348-2184 ext. 44023 Fax: 613-244-0765 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]>
